name: loving-apples
description:
cw: disturbing content.

Beneath the soil, lies a bed, beside the corpses.

Has three endings.

-

hello! i apologize for the low quality of this visual novel;; i unfortunately had to finish this earlier than expected :'( hopefully, you would enjoy it still :D tell me what you think! this is my second game and i'd love to hear what you have to say :')
